## EdgeMaterialParameters interface

Parameters used when constructing a new \[\[EdgeMaterial\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EdgeMaterialParameters extends FadingFeatureParameters, DisplacementFeatureParameters, ExtrusionFeatureParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-materials.edgematerialparameters.color.md) | number \| string | Edge color. |
|  [colorMix](./harp-materials.edgematerialparameters.colormix.md) | number | Color mix value. Mixes between vertexColors and edgeColor. |
